类 ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChessPiece
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChessPieceContract
    直接已知子类:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChessPieceContract
    Abstract class representing a generic chess piece. It implements the contract and handles shared state.
